Container.Name: DiskSpeed
Container.Overview: Display drives attached to controllers and perform benchmark speed tests. Performing the occasional benchmark will help you determine if a drive is starting to fail even if the SMART logic isn't flagging errors as of yet. Privileged mode is required for this application to function and see the storage controllers & drives attached to the host machine.
